list.description:
Schindibee's Sight for 76mm (long) M1 armed Sherman and Jumbo tanks

#customsight #sight #sherman #m4a1_76w #m4a2_76w #m4a3e2_76w #m4a3e8_76w

This package contains sights for the following tanks:
- M4A1 (76) W Sherman (US)
- M4A2 (76) W Sherman (US)
- M4A3 (76) W HVVS Sherman (US)
- M4A3E2 (76) W Jumbo (US)
- M4A2 (76) W Sherman (USSR Premium)
- M4A3 (76) W Sherman (Japan)

The sights feature primary aiming scale, ranging funnel (for tank length of 7m / width of 3.5m) and deflection aiming cues (for moving targets, 20km/ and 40km/h) for the AP and APCBC ammos, secondary aiming scales for APC

T.Z.F.KwK46 by KorEEnium

.

Works with:

.
Fully functional TZF style fictional gunsight for Tiger II 105.

Triangles are 4 mil (strich) in size.
Sight zero - 100m.
6 O'clock hold.

Comes in two forms.
a) With "historical field" of view: KorEEniums_TZF_KwK46_HistoFoV___Tiger_II_105
b) Improved standard field of view: KorEEniums_TZF_KwK46___Tiger_II_105

NOTE:
There is no support for Pzgr.

#Tiger #105 #105mm #TZF #TZFKwK46 #TZFKwK #KwK #KwK46 #gunsight #optics #vk4503 #King_Tiger

#m42 #m42duster #duster #40mm_bofors gunsight.

Modification of Sick2day's JSDF speed ring. Slightly thicker lines and smaller circles for a more visible sight. The inner circle now matches a range of 1200m for ground targets. While the second and third circle have a good aiming indication for aircraft flying straight. (this was tweaked at the A20G-25 in the JP testrange.)

Works for both the US and JP M42 (and all other 40mm Bofors, but other vehicles may not have used this particular sight version)

Setting up custom sights

1)Take the vehicle for a Test Drive, then go to game settings → Mai

Schindibee's Sight for T34 Rocket Launcher (M4 Sherman Calliope)
v2.0

#customsight #sight #t34 #calliope #sherman_calliope #rocket

This package contains a sight for the Sherman Calliope. The sight features primary aiming scale, ranging funnel (for tank length of 7m / width of 3.5m) and deflection aiming cues (for moving targets, 20km/ and 40km/h) for the AP and APCBC ammos, secondary aiming scales for HE and Smoke ammo and coaxial machine gun, and - most importantly - a ranging scale for the T34 Rocket Launcher.

The sight als features a pattern as historically used by the US Army in WW2, wi

Gun Sight For the Canon Automoteur DE SAu 40

Not sure what catagory this would be, Fictional in the sense that i have no clue if this sight was used for this particular gun however realistic in the sense that this sight was used for the similar 75mm Sa34 L/17 on the B1 Bis of the same ERA.

I have used RideR2's Fr_L_710 gunsight for the B1 Bis and corrected the ammunition value so that it works with the APX 75mm Cannon.

Honestly All credit goes to RideR2 as I have pretty much copied and pasted his work and changed the velocity of the shell. I thought that The B1 Bis FR_L_710 Sight for the 7

Gunner view specifically made for the American M103 heavy tank. This sight is purely aesthetic and not historical whatsoever. I removed the horizontal range adjustment lines and have placed more emphasis on firing at medium to long ranges, as I believe the tank excels in such combat. I included the armor values of the tank in a turret/hull format, as well as the performance card of the stock AP round (the HEAT is expensive and its performance is much easier to remember).

For SB, I have included a single line pointing to where the gun is in relation to the gunner's view. May Eisenhower guide

#ussr #sight #crosshair #su #76 #su_76 #su_76_m

Special request for @Sardaukar for the USSR SU-76-M TD with 2 diagonal lines, one for APCBCHE and other for HEAT, I hope you enjoy it, it was hard to make, and specially trying to make it easier to understand. I use circles because it was easier to fit in, but i dont really like them.

Прицельная сетка для Т-64А и Т-64Б / Aimed grid for T-64A and T-64B
Version 3.0

Объединённая сетка :
- Оперённый бронебойный подкалиберный снаряд с отделяющимся поддоном
- Осколочно-фугасный снаряд
- Спаренный пулемёт

Merged grid for:
- Plated armor-piercing sub-caliber projectile with a separable pallet
- High-explosive fragmentation projectile
- Paired Pullet
